/usr/bin/c++  -O3 -DNDEBUG   CMakeFiles/SimpleDisplayImage.dir/main.cpp.o  -o SimpleDisplayImage  -Wl,-rpath,/home/liam/dev/rbd/addons/Pangolin/build ../../libpango_display.so ../../libpango_windowing.so ../../libpango_opengl.so ../../libpango_image.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so ../../libpango_vars.so ../../libpango_core.so -lrt -lpthread
